text: Cherkassy () is a rural locality (a village) in Krasnoyarsky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 160 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located 15 km from Sterlitamak, 6 km from Novy Krasnoyar. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Cherkassy, Sterlitamaksky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
